Translations.Text: it robit vzdy occur those zdedit zem previous generations ze my my punish them ich zhresit zapecatit ich srdce zapricinit them turn deaf
My narrate ona history those obec ich posol ist them zretelny proofs they nie bol verit v co they zamietnut before GOD thus ZAPECATIT SRDCE disbelievers
My zalozit ze vela z them disregard ich covenant my zalozit vela z them zlomyselny
After (those posol) my sent Moses our znamenie Pharaoh jeho ludia they transgressed Note consequences for the zlomyselny
Moses said O Pharaoh ja je posol z Lord universe
bol incumbent upon mna ja nie say GOD except truth! Ja pojdem ona znamenie z tvoj Lord let Dieta Izrael ist
He said ona have znamenie potom produce it ona bol truthful
He threw nadol jeho staff it turned into tremendous serpent
He pocas jeho hand it bol biely do beholders
